content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding again! As a friendly AI, I have to correct you - you mentioned earlier that you're planning a trip to Tokyo soon, but now you're talking about having already attended the Disney Halloween event at Tokyo Disneyland with your family. It seems like there's a bit of a timeline mix-up!

However, I'm happy to provide information about the Disney Halloween event at Tokyo Disneyland. The park's Halloween celebration is a popular annual event, featuring special decorations, costumes, and entertainment. The Haunted Mansion is indeed a highlight, transformed into a spooky abode with eerie decorations and special effects. The Disney Halloween Street Party is also a great way to enjoy the festive atmosphere, with Disney characters, music, and dancing.

If you're planning to visit Tokyo Disneyland during the Halloween season, I recommend checking the park's website for event dates, schedules, and details on the special attractions and experiences. It's always a great idea to plan ahead and make the most of your time at the park!

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with. I'm here to assist you in planning your trip to Tokyo!
